title: Forever Loved
description: After four long years of separation, Gavin has finally reunited with his childhood love Corabelle. Sheâ€™s forgiven him for leaving after the funeral of their newborn. She even knows where he ended up and what he did.And she's still here.But a message from his past threatens their delicate reconciliation. Once again, Gavin is forced to leave Corabelle behind to determine the truth of the shocking secret he's been told about a woman he once knew.When Gavin returns with his devastating news, Corabelle realizes they must completely commit to each other, for better or for worse, to find their forever love.
author: Deanna Roy
